description.description: A plain text description of the task.
description.title: Description

title.description: The preferred viewable name of the run of the workflow.
title.title: Title

input_files.description: The files used as initial input for the workflow.
input_files.title: Input files

items.description: Info on file used as input and mapping to CWL argument for the workflow.
items.title: Input file mapping

___dimension.description: Dimension of the file in the argument, in format of e.g. "0" (singlet or 1D array), "1-2" (2D array), or "2-0-1" (3D array)
___dimension.title: Dimension

___workflow_argument_name.description: the name of the argument of the workflow that corresponds to the input file
___workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name

___ordinal.description: Ordinal of the file in the argument
___ordinal.title: Ordinal

___format_if_extra.description: the file format if the input file is an extra file of a file object
___format_if_extra.title: Format of extra file

app_name.description: The name of the App used by the workflow.
app_name.title: AppName

output_files.description: All files that are saved as output of the workflow
output_files.title: Output files

items.description: Info on file output by the workflow and how it is mapped to CWL arguments.
items.title: Output file mapping

___workflow_argument_name.description: Argument name of node in workflow that corresponds to the output file
___workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name

metadata_only.description: When True the file provenance graph was generated without a run of a 4dn-dcic pipeline.
metadata_only.title: File Provenance Graph

description_only.description: When True the file provenance graph was generated without a run of a 4dn-dcic pipeline.
description_only.title: File Provenance Graph

___dimension.description: Dimension of the parameter in the argument, in format of e.g. "0" (singlet or 1D array), "1-2" (2D array), or "2-0-1" (3D array)
___dimension.title: Dimension

___workflow_argument_name.description: the name of the argument of the workflow that corresponds to the parameter
___workflow_argument_name.title: Workflow argument name

___ordinal.description: Ordinal of the parameter in the argument
___ordinal.title: Ordinal

___value.description: a specified value for the specified parameter as used in a task
___value.title: Value

___software_parameter.description: the name or flag of the parameter as passed to the software
___software_parameter.title: Parameter name

commands.description: list of commands run for the workflow, simplified
commands.title: Run Commands

items.description: one of the commands that are run for the workflow run
items.title: Commands

description: Schema for submitting metadata on the executation of a computational analysis workflow run on Awsem.
title: Workflow Run Awsem

___awsem_postrun_json.description: Location of the AWSEM postrun json file
___awsem_postrun_json.title: Link to Postrun Json
